quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: I tore myself away from the safe comfort of certainties through my love for truth - and truth rewarded me.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: I say to people who care for people who are dying, if you really love that person and want to help them, be with them when their end comes close. Sit with them - you don't even have to talk. You don't have to do anything but really be there with them.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: At best the family teaches the finest things human beings can learn from one another generosity and love. But it is also, all too often, where we learn nasty things like hate, rage and shame.
name: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
name: Torquato Tasso

quote: If thou desire the love of God and man, be humble, for the proud heart, as it loves none but itself, is beloved of none but itself. Humility enforces where neither virtue, nor strength, nor reason can prevail.
name: Francis Quarles

quote: No woman ever hates a man for being in love with her, but many a woman hate a man for being a friend to her.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.
name: Mary Oliver

quote: There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age.
name: Jeanne Moreau

quote: The planter, the farmer, the mechanic, and the laborer... form the great body of the people of the United States, they are the bone and sinew of the country men who love liberty and desire nothing but equal rights and equal laws.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: You don't walk away if you love someone. You help the person.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Love is union with somebody, or something, outside oneself, under the condition of retaining the separateness and integrity of one's own self.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: Where love rules, there is no will to power and where power predominates, there love is lacking. The one is the shadow of the other.
name: Carl Jung

quote: If one of two lovers is loyal, and the other jealous and false, how may their friendship last, for Love is slain!
name: Marie de France

quote: Those who have the strength and the love to sit with a dying patient in the silence that goes beyond words will know that this moment is neither frightening nor painful, but a peaceful cessation of the functioning of the body.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: In our minds, love and lust are really separated. It's hard to find someone that can be kind and you can trust enough to leave your kids with, and isn't afraid to throw her man up against the wall and lick him from head to toe.
name: Tori Amos

quote: Why love if losing hurts so much? I have no answers anymore only the life I have lived. The pain now is part of the happiness then.
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: I love to hit people. I love to.
name: Mike Tyson

quote: I'm getting a wrinkle above my eyebrow because I just can't stop lifting it, and I love that you know.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: We abuse land because we regard it as a commodity belonging to us. When we see land as a community to which we belong, we may begin to use it with love and respect.
name: Aldo Leopold

quote: I usually get myself into situations that cause sparks. I mean I'm a girl that likes the storms. I love feeling alive, I love walking out in the cold in my bare feet and feeling the ice on my toes.
name: Tori Amos

quote: It is with an old love as it is with old age a man lives to all the miseries, but is dead to all the pleasures.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There is hardly any activity, any enterprise, which is started out with such tremendous hopes and expectations, and yet which fails so regularly, as love.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: It is not in the power of even the most crafty dissimulation to conceal love long, where it really is, nor to counterfeit it long where it is not.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
name: Barbara de Angelis

quote: It is a great consolation for me to remember that the Lord, to whom I had drawn near in humble and child-like faith, has suffered and died for me, and that He will look on me in love and compassion.
name: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quote: The impulse to cruelty is, in many people, almost as violent as the impulse to sexual love - almost as violent and much more mischievous.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
name: Jeremy Taylor

quote: You are precisely as big as what you love and precisely as small as what you allow to annoy you.
name: Robert Anton Wilson

quote: They're right to think that about me, because I'm the person most likely to sleep with my female fans, I genuinely love other women. And I think they know that.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
name: Paul Sweeney

quote: The only thing we never get enough of is love and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
name: Henry Miller

quote: Love is often nothing but a favorable exchange between two people who get the most of what they can expect, considering their value on the personality market.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.
name: Paul Walker

quote: Nobody loves a woman because she is handsome or ugly, stupid or intelligent. We love because we love.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Everyone can relate to love, hurt, pain, learning how to forgive, needing to get over, needing the power of God in their life.
name: Tyler Perry

quote: I have been astonished that men could die martyrs for religion - I have shuddered at it. I shudder no more - I could be martyred for my religion - Love is my religion - I could die for that.
name: John Keats

quote: When I sing, I feel like when you're first in love. It's more than sex. It's that point two people can get to they call love, when you really touch someone for the first time, but it's gigantic, multiplied by the whole audience. I feel chills.
name: Janis Joplin

quote: A woman has two smiles that an angel might envy, the smile that accepts a lover before words are uttered, and the smile that lights on the first born babe, and assures it of a mother's love.
name: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quote: A lot of times black folks look for love in all the wrong places. You're always looking for somebody to love you, be accepted, and there's the insecurities that are even transmitted through rap. Everyone is trying to aim to please too much.
name: Chuck D.

quote: Men shrink less from offending one who inspires love than one who inspires fear.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: I think the biggest disease the world suffers from in this day and age is the disease of people feeling unloved. I know that I can give love for a minute, for half an hour, for a day, for a month, but I can give. I am very happy to do that, I want to do that.
name: Princess Diana

quote: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.
name: Billie Holiday

quote: Men often pass from love to ambition, but they seldom come back again from ambition to love.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: If you cannot inspire a woman with love of you, fill her above the brim with love of herself all that runs over will be yours.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: I understand now that the vulnerability I've always felt is the greatest strength a person can have. You can't experience life without feeling life. What I've learned is that being vulnerable to somebody you love is not a weakness, it's a strength.
name: Elisabeth Shue

quote: If a man is truly in love, the most beautiful woman in the world couldn't take him away. Maybe for a few days, but not forever.
name: Eva Gabor

quote: If I think more about death than some other people, it is probably because I love life more than they do.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: Love is the river of life in the world.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: I love quotations because it is a joy to find thoughts one might have, beautifully expressed with much authority by someone recognized wiser than oneself.
name: Marlene Dietrich

quote: If so many men, so many minds, certainly so many hearts, so many kinds of love.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Love is anterior to life, posterior to death, initial of creation, and the exponent of breath.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Tell the truth. Sing with passion. Work with laughter. Love with heart. 'Cause that's all that matters in the end.
name: Kris Kristofferson

quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
name: John Ruskin

quote: It is with true love as it is with ghosts everyone talks about it, but few have seen it.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: He who knows no hardships will know no hardihood. He who faces no calamity will need no courage. Mysterious though it is, the characteristics in human nature which we love best grow in a soil with a strong mixture of troubles.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: Love is never defeated, and I could add, the history of Ireland proves it.
name: Pope John Paul II

quote: I love chicken. I would eat chicken fingers on Thanksgiving if it were socially acceptable.
name: Todd Barry

quote: In friendship as well as love, ignorance very often contributes more to our happiness than knowledge.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
name: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quote: The motto of chivalry is also the motto of wisdom to serve all, but love only one.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: When we ask for love, we don't ask others to be fair to us-but rather to care for us, to be considerate of us. There is a world of difference here between demanding justice... and begging or pleading for love.
name: Mortimer Adler

quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
name: Jose Rizal

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
name: Julia Child

quote: We always love those who admire us, but we do not always love those whom we admire.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: When people are lame, they love to blame.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: When you're taught to love everyone, to love your enemies, then what value does that place on love?
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: A James Cagney love scene is one where he lets the other guy live.
name: Bob Hope

quote: We are nearer loving those who hate us than those who love us more than we wish.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: If love is the treasure, laughter is the key.
name: Yakov Smirnoff

quote: I am deeply grateful to the citizens of Sarajevo and the Sarajevo Canton assembly for bestowing upon me this incredible honor of citizenship. I am so proud to now be a part of such an extraordinary part of the world and fellow citizen to the people I deeply love and admire.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: You will reciprocally promise love, loyalty and matrimonial honesty. We only want for you this day that these words constitute the principle of your entire life and that with the help of divine grace you will observe these solemn vows that today, before God, you formulate.
name: Pope John Paul II

quote: My trust in a higher power that wants me to survive and have love in my life, is what keeps me moving forward.
name: Kenny Loggins

quote: If you love something let it go free. If it doesn't come back, you never had it. If it comes back, love it forever.
name: Douglas Horton

quote: I love my children beyond all reason. They're my joy, even when they're wild with kid energy.
name: Christopher Meloni

quote: We may sooner be brought to love them that hate us, than them that love us more than we would have them do.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
name: George Eliot

quote: Love has its own time, its own season, and its own reasons from coming and going. You cannot bribe it or coerce it or reason it into staying. You can only embrace it when it arrives and give it away when it comes to you.
name: Kent Nerburn

quote: Love does not alter the beloved, it alters itself.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: We pardon to the extent that we love.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: This love is silent.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: To love someone means to see him as God intended him.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Love can no more continue without a constant motion than fire can and when once you take hope and fear away, you take from it its very life and being.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Let us be about setting high standards for life, love, creativity, and wisdom. If our expectations in these areas are low, we are not likely to experience wellness. Setting high standards makes every day and every decade worth looking forward to.
name: Greg Anderson

quote: Art is not the application of a canon of beauty but what the instinct and the brain can conceive beyond any canon. When we love a woman we don't start measuring her limbs.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Just as in earthly life lovers long for the moment when they are able to breathe forth their love for each other, to let their souls blend in a soft whisper, so the mystic longs for the moment when in prayer he can, as it were, creep into God.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Romance is tempestuous. Love is calm.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Where love is concerned, too much is not even enough.
name: Pierre Beaumarchais

quote: I really love idiot, enlightened characters - these characters who fail to engage with the drama of their immediate circumstances they fail to be reactive and enrolled by drama as it happens around them.
name: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: This is the miracle that happens every time to those who really love: the more they give, the more they possess.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The main facts in human life are five: birth, food, sleep, love and death.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: A religious man is a person who holds God and man in one thought at one time, at all times, who suffers harm done to others, whose greatest passion is compassion, whose greatest strength is love and defiance of despair.
name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: I did not just fall in love. I made a parachute jump.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Metaphors are dangerous. Love begins with a metaphor. Which is to say, love begins at the point when a woman enters her first word into our poetic memory.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: At the end of the day, you know, love does not happen between two perfect people as much as we would wish.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Even if a unity of faith is not possible, a unity of love is.
name: Hans Urs von Balthasar
